item.title: Asciinema - terminal recorder
item.description: Usage In my case, I copied the link Share–>Markdown and pasted into this document. This renders the frame above What is it? cli for to record session ** Advantage over GIFs Textbased - everything in the player can be selected and copied ** Advantage over capturing all text You Links Getting started https://asciinema.org/docs/how-it-works https://asciinema.org/docs/getting-started asciinema: Start wars
